style.transform: const sizeMap = { xs: 4, sm: 8, md: 16, lg: 32, xl: 64, '2xl': 96 }; const spacing = sizeMap[data[0] || 'md']; const axis = data[1] || 'vertical'; return { width: axis === 'horizontal' || axis === 'both' ? `${spacing}px` : undefined, height: axis === 'vertical' || axis === 'both' ? `${spacing}px` : undefined }
